mapper.select: select (select count(1) from pms_comment pc where product_id=pp.id) comment_count,pp.id,sale,price,shop_id,detail_html,description,stock,ppa.name,ppa.input_list,album_pics,ppa.id ppa_id from pms_product pp inner join pms_product_attribute_category ppac on ppac.id=pp.product_attribute_category_id inner join pms_product_attribute ppa on ppa.product_attribute_category_id=ppac.id where delete_status=0 and publish_status=1 and pp.id=#{id}
